conversationHistory.botResponse:
Hello! I'm here to help you reduce food waste.

Here are some practical tips:

• Proper Storage: Store vegetables in airtight containers in the refrigerator to extend their shelf life. Fruits like bananas can be kept in a cool, dark place.

• Repurpose Leftovers: Use leftover vegetables to make a mixed vegetable curry (approx. 50 BDT).

Reducing food waste lessens environmental impact in Bangladesh.

Next step: Start by properly storing your vegetables and fruits today.
